MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the DG10 postcode area of Moffat. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.59pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further fault finding investigations being required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:52pm on Tuesday, 23 February 2021
